template_input_params.name: cam_cloudconnection_id
template_input_params.description: CAM ID of the cloud connection used to connect to the cloud where the instance is going to be imported from
template_input_params.label: CAM Cloud Connection ID

template_input_params.name: cam_template_id
template_input_params.description: CAM ID of the import template used as a base for terraform import
template_input_params.label: CAM Import Template ID

template_input_params.name: cam_instancename
template_input_params.description: Name of the CAM instance that will be created after the import
template_input_params.label: CAM Instance Name

template_input_params.name: cam_namespace
template_input_params.description: CAM namespace into which the imported instance will be created
template_input_params.label: CAM namespace

template_input_params.name: cloud_instance_id
template_input_params.description: Cloud native ID of the instance to be imprted. e.g. 338aefb7-6987-4c43-88d5-09351b549b7f
template_input_params.label: Cloud Native Instance ID
